content: and body continue round 1 with the second leg continue with chain 7 now take the first leg and join with 1 single_crochet place a stitch marker into the initial st then 7 single_crochet along the first leg then 7 single_crochet across the 7-chain then 8 single_crochet along the second leg then 7 single_crochet across to the first leg 30 sts summary chain 7 first 8 single_crochet in the first leg + 7 single_crochet across + 8 single_crochet in the second leg + 7 single_crochet across = 30 sts round 2 - round 4 change color 30 sts round 5 change color 4 single_crochet increase x6 = 36 sts round 6 - round 7 36 sts round 8 change color 5 single_crochet increase x6 = 42 sts round 9 - round 10 42 sts round 11 - round 13 change color 42 sts round 14 - round 16 change color 42 sts round 17 - round 19 change color 42 sts round 20 - round 22 change color 42 sts front legs and body round 23 - round 25 change color 42 sts 7 legs tail front legs and body 8 front legs 2x and body continue round 26 change color 42 sts round 27 5 single_crochet decrease x6 = 36 sts round 28 4 single_crochet decrease x6 = 30 sts note for the upcoming round there will be a total of 30 sts we will change color we will also join the back hind legs and simultaneously crochet with the pinch leg join and crochet with body body so we do not have to sew pinch the opening hole of the leg when crocheting with the body you may need to adjust the count when joining the legs to the sides of the body pinch leg join and crochet with body round 29 5 single_crochet then take one of the back legs and join 4 single_crochet with the pinched legs and body together 13 single_crochet then take the second leg and join 4 single_crochet with the pinched leg and body together 4 single_crochet 30 sts back legs joined with body is now complete 9 front legs 2x and body continue round 30 3 single_crochet decrease x6 = 24 sts -don t forget to stuff note for the upcoming round there will be a total of 18 sts similar to how the back legs were combined to the body we will join the tail and simultaneously crochet with the body this way we do not have to sew pinch the opening hole of the tail when crocheting pinch the tail with the body you may need to adjust the count with the tail as the tail needs to be centered to the body you want the tail to curl upward and on top of the body round 31 2 single_crochet decrease x3 then take the tail and join 4 single_crochet with the pinched tail and body together then decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 18 sts round 32 1 single_crochet decrease x6
